page.title: 08MRS. DUFFY'S DAY
page.content: 7.30 in the morning Mummy gets up and dressed, has her breakfast and puts some washing in the machine.By eight o'clock she is ready to go to feed her horse, make sure he has some water,muck out,brush him ready to ride and put some hay in his net for the horse to eat.At 9.00.a.m. Mummy has usually finished so she brings the two ponies over to the stable and mucks out, fills the water and makes their bed of straw comfortable.9.30 when she gets home she makes some coffee and washes the dishes (by hand!) takes out the washing from the machine and hangs out the washing to dry and puts another load in.Mummy makes the beds, empties the bins and tidies the house.10.00.a.m. Mummy & Krissy get changed and go to Loughborough .She bought some bog plants,walked round the market and went to the bank.
